name: Carbon Footprint for Google Maps™ and Others
description: Automatically estimates CO2 emissions on Google Maps™, other maps services and train and flight search engines.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com https://ssl.google-analytics.com https://maps.google.com/ https://unpkg.com/leaflet@1.0.3/dist/leaflet.js; object-src 'self';media-src 'self';
